name: bc62fc9e-d5be-449d-8f10-8700ec8d5055
goal: Ask Customer feedback for the improvement

steps.text: Hello! Thank you for using our service today. We're always looking to improve, and your feedback helps us do just that. Would you mind sharing your thoughts with us?
Bot: How would you rate your experience today?
Bot: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! We truly appreciate it.
Bot: If you have any further comments or suggestions, feel free to share them with us anytime. Thank you again, and we look forward to serving you again soon!
